title: Offseason of relationship news continues with Nishioka wedding
description: There has been plenty of relationship news for ATP Tour players this offseason. Yoshihito Nishioka added to the list last week. The Japanese star announced he had married Saya Hiyama. Nishioka posted photos with his wife, including one with flowers and another with Pokemon dressed in a bride and groom's outfits. üíçüíçüíç „Åì„Çå„Åã„Çâ„ÅÆ2‰∫∫„Çí„Å©„ÅÜ„ÅûÂÆú„Åó„Åè„ÅäÈ°ò„ÅÑËá¥„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ pic.twitter.com/NYtKEMTDvb ‚Äî YOSHIHITO NISHIOKA (@yoshihitotennis) December 18, 2024 It was another special moment to cap a memorable year for the lefty, who claimed his third ATP Tour title earlier this year in Atlanta. He had not earned tour-level glory since 2022 in Seoul. Alex de Minaur and WTA star Katie Boulter recently announced their engagement ahead of their potential blockbuster clash at the United Cup on 1 January. Other ATP players who got engaged in recent weeks include Casper Ruud, Felix Auger-Aliassime, Alexei Popyrin and Marton Fucsovics. Bjorn Fratangelo celebrated his wedding to Madison Keys. [NEWSLETTER FORM]

html:

Player News

De Minaur and Boulter recently announced engagement

December 25, 2024

Saya Hiyama and Yoshihito Nishioka recently married. By ATP Staff

There has been plenty of relationship news for ATP Tour players this offseason. Yoshihito Nishioka added to the list last week.

The Japanese star announced he had married Saya Hiyama. Nishioka posted photos with his wife, including one with flowers and another with Pokemon dressed in a bride and groom's outfits.

üíçüíçüíç
„Åì„Çå„Åã„Çâ„ÅÆ2‰∫∫„Çí„Å©„ÅÜ„ÅûÂÆú„Åó„Åè„ÅäÈ°ò„ÅÑËá¥„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ pic.twitter.com/NYtKEMTDvb

‚Äî YOSHIHITO NISHIOKA (@yoshihitotennis) December 18, 2024

It was another special moment to cap a memorable year for the lefty, who claimed his third ATP Tour title earlier this year in Atlanta. He had not earned tour-level glory since 2022 in Seoul.

Alex de Minaur and WTA star Katie Boulter recently announced their engagement ahead of their potential blockbuster clash at the United Cup on 1 January.

Other ATP players who got engaged in recent weeks include Casper Ruud, Felix Auger-Aliassime, Alexei Popyrin and Marton Fucsovics. Bjorn Fratangelo celebrated his wedding to Madison Keys.
